scripts.test: npm run test:css && npm run test:js
scripts.start: npm run process:other:watch & npm run process:css:watch & npm run process:js:watch && wait
scripts.pkg: npm run clean && npm run process:other && npm run process:css && npm run process:js && zip -q -r build/pkg-$npm_package_version.zip dist
scripts.process:css: mkdir -p dist/styles && npm explore hovercardsshared -- npm run process:css $PWD/dist/styles/ && postcss --use autoprefixer app/styles/*.css -d dist/styles/
scripts.process:css:watch: mkdir -p dist/styles && npm explore hovercardsshared -- npm run process:css:watch $PWD/dist/styles/ & postcss --use autoprefixer app/styles/*.css -w -d dist/styles/
scripts.process:js: mkdir -p dist/scripts && npm run process:browserify && npm run process:uglifyjs
scripts.process:js:watch: npm run process:js:background:watch & npm run process:js:everywhere:watch & npm run process:js:options:watch & npm run process:js:soundcloud-player:watch & npm run process:js:top-frame:watch
scripts.process:browserify: mkdir -p dist/scripts && find app/scripts -name \*main.js | xargs -n 1 basename | xargs -I FILENAME browserify app/scripts/FILENAME -o dist/scripts/FILENAME -r ./app/scripts/production-env.js:env -t jstify
scripts.process:uglifyjs: mkdir -p dist/scripts && find dist/scripts -name \*.js | xargs -I FILENAME uglifyjs FILENAME -o FILENAME -c drop_console=true,warnings=false --stats
scripts.process:js:background:watch: mkdir -p dist/scripts && watchify app/scripts/background-main.js -o dist/scripts/background-main.js -r ./app/scripts/development-env.js:env -t jstify -v -d
scripts.process:js:everywhere:watch: mkdir -p dist/scripts && watchify app/scripts/everywhere-main.js -o dist/scripts/everywhere-main.js -r ./app/scripts/development-env.js:env -t jstify -v -d
scripts.process:js:options:watch: mkdir -p dist/scripts && watchify app/scripts/options-main.js -o dist/scripts/options-main.js -r ./app/scripts/development-env.js:env -t jstify -v -d
scripts.process:js:soundcloud-player:watch: mkdir -p dist/scripts && watchify app/scripts/soundcloud-player-main.js -o dist/scripts/soundcloud-player-main.js -r ./app/scripts/development-env.js:env -t jstify -v -d
scripts.process:js:top-frame:watch: mkdir -p dist/scripts && watchify app/scripts/top-frame-main.js -o dist/scripts/top-frame-main.js -r ./app/scripts/development-env.js:env -t jstify -v -d
